comments:
Hi,
-When using Scripted Data Source in  generating and populating the report's data ,it always throws exception in a specific line which i write something like this.
[someObject.get(AnyClassName.class.getName);]
-So i tried to just only write the following:
[AnyClassName.class]
-And it always throws exception,so i realized that the problem is in the .class
calling to any class name so may be it's class loading problem.
-since all i need from this line is just the name of the calling class so i tried to use the fully qualified name of the class instead of ClassName.class 
as follow: 
[someObject.getAll("com.name1.name2.ClassName");]
-but also throws exception so if there any help ,please provide me with.

P.S the line which makes the problem resides in open function.

Thanks,
This feature is supported by DATA team. Reassign.

You mean i should send the question again to the DATA team, And if i should, do that, how can i reach them?

Thanks alot for your quick response.

(In reply to comment #1)
> This feature is supported by DATA team. Reassign.
It has been reassigned to data team, and I will make investigation on your issue ASAP.

If possible, could you please attach your report and the exception trace you've got? BTW, did you import all neccessary class you used?

Thanks
Mingxia

Yes i imported the necessary classes I used. And here is the stack trace below this paragraph. and i hope if you can help me to fix this ASAP.
Thanks alot for your interest and quick response.

Thanks,
Mohamed.

Hi,from the error stack you attached, here might be something wrong with your script:
-->Caused by: org.mozilla.javascript.EvaluatorException: missing name
-->after . operator

And I found in your java script, there is such calling:
data=obj.getAll(Person.class.getName());
It will be taken on as function call in js. So it'd better to change like this:
data=obj.getAll((new Person()).getClass( ).getName( ));

For sorrow it does not work either.So the main question here: Can i look for a class from within a class loader inside my javascript code?And if i can what is exactly the class loader that birt will seach in?

Did it throw the same exception?
like?F
-->Caused by: org.mozilla.javascript.EvaluatorException: missing name
-->after . operator
yes it throws the same exception.
